vote.text: Amendment SA 807 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 807 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Shaheen. (consideration: CR S5019; text: CR S5019) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 807 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Shaheen.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 807 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
